meanings.sent1: The children were yays when they saw the colorful balloons at the party.
meanings.sent2: She received yays comments on her artwork from her classmates.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's yays tail wagging showed how happy he was to see his owner.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a yays place with flowers blooming in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The yays smiles on their faces brightened up the room.

meanings.definition: A loud cry of joy or approval
meanings.sent1: The stadium echoed with the yays of the excited fans.
meanings.sent2: After the announcement, there were loud yays of celebration in the room.
meanings.sent3: The yays of the crowd could be heard from miles away.
meanings.sent4: Her heart filled with warmth at the yays of her loved ones.
meanings.sent5: The yays of the audience filled the theater with energy.
